index.title: Personal website of Matt Parrilla
index.description: Data visualizations, blog posts, and random musings of an embedded cultural anthropologist

how-to-communicate-as-you-scale-your-org.title: How To Communicate As You Scale Your Org
how-to-communicate-as-you-scale-your-org.description: Embracing a written culture can help your organization get through growing pains as you scale from small to medium sized.

how-to-tell-where-robot-is-underwater.title: How To Tell Where Your Robot Is When It's Underwater
how-to-tell-where-robot-is-underwater.description: An introduction to inertial navigation in marine robotics, from the sensors used to the mathematical tools needed to fuse that sensor data into a navigation solution

inertial-navigation-marine-robotics.title: Inertial Navigation in Marine Robotics
inertial-navigation-marine-robotics.description: An introduction to inertial navigation in marine robotics, from the sensors used to the mathematical tools needed to fuse that sensor data into a navigation solution

negotiation-http2-alpn-tls-handshake.title: Negotiating HTTP/2: ALPN and the TLS Handshake
negotiation-http2-alpn-tls-handshake.description: HTTP/2 in the browser uses ALPN to extend TLS by including the protocol negotiation in the exchange of hello messages. The client provides a list of protocols it speaks and the server responds with its selected protocol. No additional round-trip required.

improving-the-weather-on-twitter.title: Improving The Weather On Twitter
improving-the-weather-on-twitter.description: Using National Weather Service data and imagery to make a network of twitter bots that post regional radar GIFs with improved palettes and projections.

to-do-what-you-love-quit-what-you-dont.title: To Do What You Love Quit What You Don't
to-do-what-you-love-quit-what-you-dont.description: Life is too short to spend your waking hours to not love what you do. To do what you love, quit what you don't

green-mountains.title: Green Mountain Maps
green-mountains.description: High resolution elevation maps of the Green Mountains designed for winter.

mount-mansfield-region.title: Mount Mansfield Region
mount-mansfield-region.subtitle: The Green Mountains From the Winooski to the Lamoille
mount-mansfield-region.description: High resolution elevation map of the  Mount Mansfield region from the Winooski to the Lamoille.
